info.title: RSS3 Data API
info.description: Check openapi.json file's `x-extension.metadataTypes` for the relationship between metadata, tag and type.

account.description: Retrieve activities from the specified list of accounts

action_limit.description: Specify the number of actions within the activity to retrieve

cursor.description: Specify the cursor used for pagination

limit.description: Specify the number of activities to retrieve

network.description: Retrieve activities from the specified network(s)

platform.description: Retrieve activities from the specified platform(s)

since_timestamp.description: Retrieve activities starting from this timestamp

tag.description: Retrieve activities from the specified tag(s)

type.description: Retrieve activities from the specified type(s)

until_timestamp.description: Retrieve activities up to this timestamp

post.description: Retrieve activities of a list of accounts.
